translations: 经验；遭遇（undergo 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: He underwent a three-hour heart operation.
sentences.translation: 他接受了三个小时的心脏手术。

sentences.sentence: I underwent an operation on my groin once.
sentences.translation: 我的腹股沟部位曾动过一次手术。

sentences.sentence: My mother underwent major surgery last year.
sentences.translation: 我母亲去年动过大手术。
